Text: Dabe̩ne̩ kʼododo lili ki jʼef ikeke,
Alu kʼoli ape̩l de̩ ef oli efoko,
I mʼumi du wʼunyi omi achiwebe̩te̩ma,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩ dab egbi,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩ ko̩la oñ i ka ñw umi kakini:
todu go, afu o̩we̩ takpa me̩,
O ikede-mi, kʼe̩ dʼef akpolokuta, ugbo umaja o̩gba okuta lile,
Omi nʼe̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩, owñ la ne̩ mi ge̩,
